summary: The class serves as the central graphical interface that coordinates the workflow of preparing data, constructing computational models, executing solvers, and presenting results. It organizes UI components into tabs for preprocessing and postprocessing, manages model building, runs the solving process, updates visualizations, and handles application lifecycle events.
business_intent: Deliver an integrated desktop tool that enables users to configure, run, and analyze computational models through an intuitive UI, streamlining data preparation, execution, and result visualization.
